import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { addStudent } from '../feature/Slicer/studentSlice' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' // import Display from './Display' function AddStudent() { const [name, setName] = useState("") const [mark, setMark] = useState("") const dispatch = useDispatch() const addStudentHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log("Added student:", { name, mark }) dispatch(addStudent({name,mark})) setName("") setMark("") } return (

Add Student

setName(e.target.value)} className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:border-indigo-500" /> setMark(e.target.value)} className="w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:border-indigo-500" />
View Student List
) } export default AddStudent
